name: Crazy Kayak
description:
Grab your paddle, and get ready for a rad kayak journey down river!

Crazy Kayak is a fast paced, easy to play retro arcade adventure! What's your high score?

- Easy controls: Tap the left side of the screen to paddle the kayak left, tap the right side to paddle the kayak right.
- Avoid the obstacles as you collect your character's favorite objects.
- Use your coins to unlock a kooky cast of kayakers.
- Unlock bears, alien, dragons, victor vampire, cats, and more!
- Leaderboards to compare your scores against friends and players from around the world.
- An endless adventure you can play over and over!

If you enjoy Crazy Kayak, please leave a review! Thanks for playing!
